717090.name: Game-Ready Assets
717090.description:
Game-Ready Assets is a content collection made for gamedevelopers.
Content comprises source FBX and texture files.
It has more than 500 models, textures and materials.
We developed easy-to-use application to browse, view and download any model you need.
Also we've prepared a special large free collection for you!
Every collection will often be updated with new models and model-packs.
Collections list will be expanded in course of time!

List of Packages:
  • Urban Interior Props Pack
  • Ancient Catacombs
  • Morgue Props Pack
  • Old-School Props Pack
  • Sci-Fi Textures Pack (with props)
  • FREE Big Furniture Pack
  • FREE Music Pack
  • Blood Textures vol.1-2
  • Spiderweb Pack
  • Lockers Pack vol.1
  • Road Pack
  • Rocks Pack
  • FREE Turets Pack
  • FREE Books Pack
  • Mummy Pack
  • Industrial Textures Pack
  • Old Wine Bottles Pack

    In Development
    • Game-Ready - Monsters Collection
    • Game-Ready - Textures/Materials Collection
    • Game-Ready - Sound/Music Collection
